subject: Athletics and Sports
Deaths (Obituaries)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Juliet Macur recalls her father’s appreciation of sports, which she quickly adopted. If it were not for him, she writes, “I wouldn’t be a sportswriter."
snippet: Juliet Macur recalls her father’s appreciation of sports, which she quickly adopted. If it were not for him, she writes, “I wouldn’t be a sportswriter."
